io.micronaut.context

Interface ApplicationContextProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationContextLifeCycle<T>, EmbeddedApplication<T>, EmbeddedServer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFunctionExecutor, FunctionApplication, FunctionInitializer, MessagingApplication, NettyHttpServer, StreamFunctionExecutor

    public interface ApplicationContextProvider
    An interface for classes that provide an ApplicationContext.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
